product_name: Von Zipper MindGlo Lomax Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Von Zipper MindGlo Lomax Sunglasses offer great style and 100% UV protection. They're a great choice for summer outings, whether casual or active. Blue frames feature gray-tinted lenses for neutral, true color perception in bright conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are impact resistant. Rubber nosepads and temples help keep the VonZi[pper MindGlo Lomax Sunglasses in place when your activity level rises. Rugged stainless-steel hinges boost durability.
short_description: The Von Zipper MindGlo Lomax Sunglasses offer great style and 100% UV protection. They're a great choice for summer outings, whether casual or active.
